import React, { useState } from 'react' import logo from '../Assets/Image/logo.png' import SearchBarAction from '../Store/Action/SearchBarAction' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import AutoComplete from '../../src/AutoComplete' const Header = () => { const [SearchInput, SetSearchInput] = useState('') const [Suggestion, SetSuggestion] = useState([]) const Searchbardata = useSelector(state => state.SearchBarReducer.SearchBarData) console.log(Searchbardata) const dispatch = useDispatch() const changeHandler = (e) => { SetSearchInput(e.target.value.toLowerCase()) SearchBarAction(dispatch, {}) if (SearchInput) { SetSuggestion(Searchbardata) } else { SetSuggestion([]) } } console.log("sugg", Suggestion) const filterdata = Suggestion.filter(element => { return element.Title.toLowerCase().includes(SearchInput.toLowerCase()); }); console.log("filter", filterdata) // useEffect(() => { // dispatch(SearchBarAction, SearchInput) // }, [dispatch]); console.log(SearchInput) return ( <>
    {filterdata.map((item, index) => { return (
  • {item.Title}
    • ) })}

) } export default Header
